Node.gloss: to speak|to mention|to tell
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= piece of cloth that is raised on a pole; ► symbolizes the identity of a group of people, and helps to keep the group together; ≈ associated with security

= an object that represents and identifies a group of people; in the form of a flag or a metal or wooden board, often with an image; attached to a pole so that it can be carried; used in both military and religious contexts
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: father's house = family
Node.definition: = a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: Tent of Meeting
Node.definition: literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

Node.gloss: Tent of Meeting
Node.definition: literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

Node.gloss: to camp|to be encamped
Node.definition: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= piece of cloth that is raised on a pole; ► symbolizes the identity of a group of people, and helps to keep the group together; ≈ associated with security
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= man; ◄ son of Amminadab (עַמִּינָדָב) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) (also known as Salmah (שַׂלְמָה) and Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) and ancestor of David (דָּוִד) tribal chief during time of Moses (מֹשֶׁה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Ram (רָם) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of Nahshon (נַחְשֹׁון)
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

Node.gloss: to count|to number|to muster|to hold a roll call
Node.definition: = action by which humans carefully observe a relatively large group of people or objects, ► with the purpose of determining their number, establishing whether everyone is present, or, in the case of an army, to get to know their fighting strength
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= state in which a countable entity is seventy in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

Node.gloss: to depart|to set out
Node.definition: literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= piece of cloth that is raised on a pole; ► symbolizes the identity of a group of people, and helps to keep the group together; ≈ associated with security

literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= piece of cloth that is raised on a pole; ► symbolizes the identity of a group of people, and helps to keep the group together; ≈ associated with security

Node.gloss: genus|kind (of animals)|clan|family

literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
